actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Hank Aaron, in recognition of his contributions to the national pastime of baseball and his perseverance in overcoming discrimination and adversity to become a role model for all Americans.
short_title: Hank Aaron Congressional Gold Medal Act

titles.title: Hank Aaron Congressional Gold Medal Act

To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Hank Aaron, in recognition of his contributions to the national pastime of baseball and his perseverance in overcoming discrimination and adversity to become a role model for all Americans.
